verses.name: Matthew 9:1
verses.text: And he entered into a ship, and passed over, and came into his own city.

verses.name: Matthew 9:2
verses.text: And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.

verses.name: Matthew 9:3
verses.text: And, behold, certain of the scribes said within themselves, This man blasphemeth.

verses.name: Matthew 9:4
verses.text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said, Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts?

verses.name: Matthew 9:5
verses.text: For whether is easier, to say, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and walk?
